name: carbos
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Increases Speed effort by 10, but won’t increase it beyond 100. Increases happiness by 5/3/2.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. When consumed, it raises the base Speed stat of a single Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. When consumed, it raises the base Speed stat of a single Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. When consumed, it raises the base Speed stat of a single Pokémon.
